areas-fabric.duskconfig.title: Areas Config
areas-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_giveUnnamed: When enabled, gives signs without an area name a randomly chosen one from a preset list.
areas-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_radiusAroun: The radius in blocks around the player in which to check for area signs.
areas-fabric.duskconfig.radiusAroundPlay: Radius Around Player To Check For Signs
areas-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_sendChatMes: When enabled, sends the player the area notifications in chat.
areas-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_showHUDMess: When enabled, sends the player the area notifications in the HUD on screen.
areas-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_joinPrefix: The prefix of the message whenever a player enters an area.
areas-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_joinSuffix: The suffix of the message whenever a player enters an area.
areas-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_leavePrefix: The prefix of the message whenever a player leaves an area.
areas-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_leaveSuffix: The suffix of the message whenever a player leaves an area.
areas-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_HUDOnlyArea: When enabled, only shows the areaname in the HUD. When disabled, the prefixes and suffices will also be used.
areas-fabric.duskconfig.HUDOnlyAreaName: H U D Only Area Name
areas-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_HUDMessageF: The delay in ms after which the HUD message should fade out.
areas-fabric.duskconfig.HUDMessageFadeDe: H U D Message Fade Delay Ms
areas-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_HUDMessageH: The vertical offset (y coord) for the HUD message. This determines how far down the message should be on the screen. Can be changed to prevent GUIs from overlapping.
areas-fabric.duskconfig.HUDMessageHeight: H U D Message Height Offset
areas-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_HUD_FontSiz: Increases the font size of the text in the HUD message. If you change this value, make sure to test the different GUI scale settings in-game. 6.0 is considered large.
areas-fabric.duskconfig.HUD_FontSizeScal: H U D_ Font Size Scale Modifier
areas-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_HUD_RGB_R: The red RGB value for the HUD message.
areas-fabric.duskconfig.HUD_RGB_R: H U D_ R G B_ R
areas-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_HUD_RGB_G: The green RGB value for the HUD message.
areas-fabric.duskconfig.HUD_RGB_G: H U D_ R G B_ G
areas-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_HUD_RGB_B: The blue RGB value for the HUD message.
areas-fabric.duskconfig.HUD_RGB_B: H U D_ R G B_ B
